Crypto_MCB_t Struct Reference

Crypto Driver Master Control Block. More...

#include <drivers/crypto/include/crypto_internal.h>

Data Fields

Crypto_Type type
 Crypto type for which this MCB is used - AES or HMAC.
 
SemaphoreP_Handle sem
 Handle to the Semaphore used to notify application of I2C transfer complete.
 

Detailed Description

Crypto Driver Master Control Block.

The structure is used to hold all the pertinent information with respect to the Crypto Driver.
